title: Sampler, 1804
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and two-sided cross stitches plain weave foundation
description: Spot motifs, including large Spies of Eskol, at the top; alphabet and pattern bands at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1804.
1804. Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and two-sided cross stitches plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-467.
